----- Original Message ----- 
From: "David Vydra" <david@...>
> Malcom,
> Thanks for your suggestion. I will investigte it. I am curious if anyone
has
> written a version of console runner with class loading that can be called
> from java?

I posted a reloading classloader example to the files section which can
be used to run each test case in it's own classloader (so statics get
reinitialised per test case).

The JUnit reloading classloader is deliberately written not to delegate
to the parent/system classloader. If you allow the system classloader
to load a class, it cannot be reloaded. In order to reload a class, you
have to use a new classloader instance each time.

- Neil
